Instruct students in advanced mathematical concepts, fostering both abstract and concrete reasoning skills to enhance their problem-solving abilities. Design and deliver structured lessons that integrate logical thinking, analytical strategies, and the application of prior knowledge to solve complex mathematical challenges.

Collaborate with students to develop effective study habits and cultivate a lifelong appreciation for mathematics.
